about_the_game:
Overview

Technitive is a first-person open-world tower defense survival game.
Play either with your friends or battle on your own! Explore this unknown planet of riches, defend it from hostiles, and save the world!

Advancing and Automating

Grow your colony. Become more advanced in machinery and refining materials to create more powerful weaponry to fight off those who want to destroy your colony. Start from the resources you find around you, creating crude tools, and turn it into machinery.

Survive

Survive against the endless waves of enemies that progressively get more difficult as you advance in the game. At the beginning, gather spears, as you advance, collect guns!

Features

  • Co-op: Enjoy the experience either by yourself or a team of 4 and colonize the planet!
  • Automation: Automate your experience with factories. Create refineries, turrets, and many more to defend and innovate your colony!
  • Open World: Explore maps with different features that give a real open world experience. Cross mountains, rivers, and different biomes to plant your colony at just the right spot to innovate!

    Want to join our development process?
    Join our Discord!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains weapon violence, blood, and killing.

name: Technitive
short_description: Technitive is a first-person open world tower defense set in 2043, where you advance from primitive tools to machines and modern weapons. A colonization attempt is set on an Earth-like planet after an extinction threat to Earth. Colonize the planet and save mankind!
